parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
Prophetic, uttered by a prophet. From prophetes; pertaining to a foreteller.
Firm, steadfast, enduring, sure, certain. From the base of basis; stable.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A lamp. From the base of leukos; a portable lamp or other illuminator.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From auchmos; properly, dirty, i.e. obscure.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To shine through, dawn (of the light coming through the shadows). From dia and augazo; to glimmer through, i.e. Break.
And, even, also, namely.
(lit: light-bearing), radiant, the morning-star. From phos and phero; light-bearing, i.e., the morning-star.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
